_comment: Tool configuration for SinzTools. Add new tools here and they will automatically appear on the home page (if featured=true) and tools index page.
_instructions: To add a new tool: 1) Add entry below with slug, name, description, keywords, and featured flag 2) Create tool directory in src/tools/ 3) Run npm run build

_fields.slug: URL slug for the tool (must match directory name in src/tools/)
_fields.name: Display name of the tool
_fields.keywords: Comma-separated keywords for SEO and search
_fields.featured: true = appears on home page, false = tools index only
